definition: lightning attack/Blitzkrieg

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
surname Shan
to hit/to strike/to break/Taiwan pr. [ji2]
lightning war/Blitzkrieg

sentences.english: Blitzing while you jog is a great way to increase your speed.
sentences.chinese: 在慢跑时闪击，是提高你的速度的极好方法。

sentences.english: The quick succession of strokes is what causes the lightning channel to flicker.
sentences.chinese: 接二连三的快速闪击，则是使闪电通道闪烁的主因。

sentences.english: It is the equivalent of a coast-to-coast marketing blitz.
sentences.chinese: 这是一次全美范围对等的闪击式营销。

sentences.english: I have been asked how I felt in the Blitz.
sentences.chinese: 有人问我闪击战期间的感受。

sentences.english: Both natural and man-made lightning flashes are usually composed of several strokes.
sentences.chinese: 自然及人造的闪电，通常皆由数个闪击所构成。
